scripts.cypress:report: cypress run --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=cypress/reports/mochawesome,overwrite=false,html=false,json=true && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/mochawesome/*.json > cypress/reports/mochawesome/mochawesome.json && npx marge cypress/reports/mochawesome/mochawesome.json -f report -o cypress/reports/mochawesome
